title: The Halloween mod
content:
(No, its not LL, but its close.)

I know its an entire month late, but good things take time. This is Benvolio, Levellords and Spleens Halloween mod, and um, yeah; [url=http://levellord.toxicsheep.com/Halloween.zip]download it and play it and stuff.[/url]

And thats about it, yep.



A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: The Halloween mod
content:
Thank you Sarah (?) [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img]

I look forward to trying this when I have a bit more time!

Wow! LevelLord, Spleen, AND Benvolio!

*craps pants*[img]http://www.denness.net/rpi/username/mr12000[/img]

title: Re: The Halloween mod
content:
Yeah, this mod is really neat! It's scary too!
The story is fun, graphics and levels good, nice patching.. Some levels are just huge, so there's Benvolio style too. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: The Halloween mod
content:
I've only started to play with it, but it looks promising.

Why is that when I play, there's always someone wanting to talk with me on MSN? That stupid MSN doesn't let me play in peace... it minimizes the dos windows when someone writes. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] [hr]The human brain is not user-friendly...

title: Re: The Halloween mod
content:
Who did the title screen? Looks like the work of Synduo to me...

Also, why does the ending screen have the commanderkeen.net URL? That place has been dead since 2002, I think.[url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url]

content:

title: Re: The Halloween mod
content: Wow. This is really great. Everything is very high quality and well done. I'm very impressed. You guys did a great job on this.

title: Re: The Halloween mod
content: played 2 levels so far.  very awesome.  the art looks great.  in one of the levels there was this huge skull and i just stopped to look at the amazing pixel work.  whoever did that is my hero.  i didnt care much for the keen replacement. is it keen in a costume?  ill play more later.[img]http://www.denness.net/rpi/username/mr12000[/img]

title: Re: The Halloween mod
content:
This mod is so addictive! Must stop playing! So... tired...

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img]

The player has got to be the cutest player sprite I have ever seen. What with the vorticon head on it and everything. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

I am so tired. I hope I won't have to edit noobness out of this tomorrow.

Anyway I love the mod. It is cool! *Thumbs up*

title: Re: The Halloween mod
content:
Indeed. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] The player sprite looks pretty good.

Out of curiosity, what did you contribute, najawa?

Either the way, gotta finish it now, since hadn't time to do so yesterday..

Edit: There are some tile bugs. The most serious is in the shooting cannon that faces right -- its very edge on right kills if Keen touches it. That's why it's impossible to reach the Lindsey without using God mode for a second to get past the cannon.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: The Halloween mod
content:
Well... it wasn't really that big... I was just asked to include Harvey's grave (which the joke was on me when they modded my 2 tiles, and added an N to them [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] )

[img]http://www.najawa.com/ck/mods/levellord/harvey%20grave.bmp[/img]

Sorry, it is a bitmap; this is the upload link I used when giving it to Sarah.

They just added this:

[img]http://www.najawa.com/ck/mods/levellord/lol-not.bmp[/img]

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img]

You just wonder what they are hinting at...Tough Guys Can Fix There Own Problems!!!
